ticket.title: Section 2.5 of I18n guide for Rails 3.0 is outdated
ticket.original-body:
Warning at the end of section 2.5 in I18n guide for Rails 3.0 (http://guides.rubyonrails.org/i18n.html#setting-the-locale-from-the-url-params - "This solution has currently one rather big downside...") is not true - it was true in Rails 2.3.
It's already removed in edge guides (http://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/i18n.html#setting-the-locale-from-the-url-params) and should be removed from version for Rails 3.0 as well.
